<title level="1" pfs="">[Palzu](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1970)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 34

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Palzu](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1970)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 35</row>

**Perception** +17; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), [_Jax_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1590) (10 rounds), scimitar sheat (empty)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 135

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_Jax_ +18 ([Critical Fusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=402), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 2d4+7 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d8+7 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_Jax_ +18 ([Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal aim d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 40 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 2d6+4 piercing plus crack shot

**Crack Shot**   When Palzu critically hits a creature with a ranged Strike, the target must succeed at a DC 26 Fortitude save or be [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).

**Howling Bullet** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68)) **Requirements** Palzu has rolled initiative but hasn't acted yet in combat; **Effect** Palzu lets loose a blood-curdling howl while firing his rifle, making the report sound unearthly and disturbing. Palzu makes a _Jax_ Strike against a foe within 40 feet. On a hit, creatures in a 10-foot emanation centered on the target hit must attempt a DC 26 Will save or become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19).

**Rugged Travel**   Palzu ignores the first square of difficult terrain he moves into each time he Steps or Strides.

</column>
name: Palzu
